title: feat: OpenClaw integration â€” landing page, setup script, docs
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Launched a dedicated landing page and setup script to seamlessly integrate Pollinations models with OpenClaw.
gist.impact: OpenClaw users can now instantly configure Kimi, GPT, and Gemini as their model providers with a single command.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations Bee collaborating with the OpenClaw mascot (a cute pixel art crab). They are working together at a computer terminal in a cozy digital garden, representing the seamless connection between the two tools.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee and a cute 8-bit crab character (OpenClaw) high-fiving near a glowing computer terminal. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Cute crab and bee characters with chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Pixel text 'OpenClaw'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
